name: A (very) blocky game
description:
Developer Note: This game is a (very) early build of the game - see what I did there ;)

I am a high school student who is developing 3 games, and has to manage a youtube channel. This is my first project and I hope you guys understand that I can't release the game with everything I want in it. Therefore, I will be updating the game over a peroid of time for you guys. However, this may take a while to do as, like I said, I'm very busy. Also, this game is based of of Brackeys' tutorial on how to make a game and the demo he created in it.

Donations are NOT needed, but since this site offers it, I'll just make it an option.

My Youtube Channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9kq0TnfufVhJc4WfYEOVyg?view_as=public
